## broken packages reinstall

```
broken = names(which(
  sapply(rownames(installed.packages()), function(i) {
    system2('Rscript', c('-e', shQuote(sprintf('library(%s)', i))))
  }) != 0
))
if (length(broken)) install.packages(broken)
```
